settings.editor: DJ Eklypse is a Canadian indie rock band based in Montreal, Quebec. The band members are: Devon Shwartz on vocals, guitar and percussion; Conner McDavid on vocals, guitar and keyboard; Dylan Dylan on vocals, drums and keyboard; and Isaac Mohamed on vocals, percussions, mandolin, keyboard and guitar. The group is known for their heavy use of percussion, and for playing multiple instruments during live performances.
